thread.title: Fears of fresh job losses at Tata Steel as industry and government hold crisis summit
thread.title_full: Fears of fresh job losses at Tata Steel as industry and government hold crisis summit

author: Alan Tovey
title: Fears of fresh job losses at Tata Steel as industry and government hold crisis summit
text: Engineering Fears of fresh job losses at Tata Steel as industry and government hold crisis summit Fears Tata Steel is preparing to announcing new wave of job cuts as ministers stage steel summit to help beleaguered industry Feeling the heat: Cheap imports and high energy costs have heaped pressure on British steel companies By Alan Tovey , Industry Editor 9:00PM BST 15 Oct 2015
